title: Another stupid rank season of noobs 2020 let it begin
body: Cant wait to start ill keep you updated on how its going ðŸ¤˜

replies.body: Well im happy, i'v had 6 wins 3 losses and will be bronze for after placements......

This deserves so many sad reacts :(

But you got this man, climb outta that hellhole into the next hellhole
Thanks mate! Is Silver hellhole better than bronze hellhole?

yeah im fairly annoyed i started playing last season climbed to silver 3 then placements, carry first game hard while rest of the team eats glue and win 20-3 -  placed Iron 1, what the hell, then go on to win 6 - lose 4, bronze 3, bullshit

I am honestly about ready to leave. Game after game of inters, feeders, people with absolutely no clue about macro/positioning. 

The game honestly isn't enjoyable at the moment.

Heres how it's goin so far for us

An afk almost every game.
ADCs are inting than leaving.
Junglers "counter jungle" (code for feeding enemy jungler)
And no one rolls a tank.

I completely agree, currently 5 games into placements I have 2 people go afk, 3 intentional feeders, 2 people mute all at the start and proceed to ignore the entirety of the game outside their lane and one game, they forced an FF when we were winning. This is the most toxic placements I have ever had.
